tools.name: click
tools.description: Click an element on the page

tools.name: fill
tools.description: Fill a form element with a value (fast, direct value setting)

tools.name: type
tools.description: Type text into an element character by character with realistic delays (appends to existing text - use fill to replace)

tools.name: wait
tools.description: Wait for specified seconds (useful after actions that trigger page changes, modals, or dynamic content loading)

tools.name: observe
tools.description: Record what you observe on the page (UI state, messages, errors). Use this when you need to note important observations.

tools.name: think
tools.description: Record your reasoning about what to do next and why. Use this when you need to explain your thought process.

tools.name: complete_work
tools.description: Signal that you have successfully completed the subtask

tools.name: abort_work
tools.description: Signal that you cannot proceed further with this subtask (stuck, blocked, error, or impossible to complete)

arguments.text: I need to filter by 'Fasteners' first to find the screws.
I will click on the 'Fasteners' checkbox to filter the products. The element ID for 'Fasteners' is input-19.
